name: Create a membership for a account sending an invalid email. -- @1.4

steps.name: Given I set up a "POST" request to "/accounts/{id}/memberships" endpoint
And I set up the data
Then I get a "400" status code as response
And I should see a messages error: One or more request parameters was missing or invalid.
And I Should see the requirement: dookue@do.1 is not a valid email address.
And I Should see the problem: One or more consistency checks failed on the supplied Person.

labels.name: feature
labels.value: Functional test cases Negative to create account membership
